content.raw:
cool, I have it mostly working! The double pendulum and gas station models work great.

A couple of issues:

* When uploading models, I am able to change the path of the model directory but the list of files do not refresh.

* The cordless drill model is black. The browser seems to be looking for the texture in an undefined directory: `file:///media/ian/tmp/depot/gzweb/http/client/undefined../materials/textures/cordless_drill.png`
content.html:
cool, I have it mostly working! The double pendulum and gas station models work great.

A couple of issues:

  • When uploading models, I am able to change the path of the model directory but the list of files do not refresh.

  • The cordless drill model is black. The browser seems to be looking for the texture in an undefined directory: file:///media/ian/tmp/depot/gzweb/http/client/undefined../materials/textures/cordless_drill.png
